casebody.data:
American Steam-Boiler Ins. Co., Appellant, v. Schiffer, Respondent. <Common Pleas of New York City and County, General Term. November 12, 1890.) Appeal from city court, general term.

Argued before Daly, C. J., and Bischoff and Pryor, JJ.

Wolff & Hodges, for appellant. Theall & Beall, for respondent.

No opinion. Judgment affirmed, with costs.
